DOC.HEADLINE: CHINA EXECUTES 8 FOR VIOLENCE AGAINST WOMEN
DOC.TEXT: China , seeking to end an age-old tradition of discrimination against women , has executed eight people in a single day for committing violent crimes against them . The defendants were put_to_death Tuesday after the Beijing People ' s Intermediate Court upheld death sentences given by a lower court for a range of crimes , including murder , rape and robbery , the Beijing Daily said Wednesday .
